com.twilio.ipmessaging.Message

    Package Description
    com.twilio.ipmessaging

    • Uses of Message in com.twilio.ipmessaging

      Methods in com.twilio.ipmessaging that return Message 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Message Messages.createMessage(java.lang.String message)
      Method to createMessage.
      Message[] Messages.getMessages()
      Returns messages received so far from backend, messages are loaded asynchronously so this may not fully represent all history available for channel.
      Methods in com.twilio.ipmessaging with parameters of type Message 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ChannelListener.onMessageAdd(Message message)
      Called when a Message is added to the channel the current user is subscribed to.
      void ChannelListener.onMessageChange(Message message)
      Called when a Message is changed for the channel the current user is subscribed to.
      void ChannelListener.onMessageDelete(Message message)
      Called when a Message is deleted from the channel the current user is subscribed to.
      void Messages.sendMessage(Message message)
      Sends a message to the channel.
